author: yperbasis
content: <@687974325072035882> could you take a look please?

author: funnygiulio
content: what machine is this for sshing and getting logs?

author: funnygiulio
content: this looks like a simple execution bug

author: funnygiulio
content: oh is the block supposed to be invalid or not?

author: funnygiulio
content: i think <@&595683849225240704> should not keep sending us an invalid hash as fcu if we mark it as invalid? I am not sure why lighthouse keep sending us a bad fcu if that is what it is

author: funnygiulio
content: maybe it optimistically imported a bad block, it seems that lh was in optimistic sync for a long time for some reason

author: funnygiulio
content: ok yes erigon seems to never receive an fcu during the sync process until very late and then it is too late

author: parithosh
content: what do you mean by too late? wouldnt erigon just wait around until lighthouse sends it an fcu?

author: funnygiulio
content: It does not send fcu only newPayloads

author: funnygiulio
content: what i think is happening is that it never gets out of optimistic sync

author: funnygiulio
content: need to investigate more but this what it looks like to me so far

author: parithosh
content:
you can see all the requests and responses it sends using the engine-snooper in case you want to see all the requests it ever sent erigon:
`docker logs snooper-engine 2>&1 | grep "search term"`

author: potuz
content: Yeah we discussed this the other day, LightHouse does not send FCU when syncing up to a finalized checkpoint. But it should not have synced a finalized checkpoint without sending FCU. cc <@602753420033785856>

author: sproul
content: Lighthouse does send fcU, but omits newPayload while doing finalization sync. We'll look into it though

author: potuz
content: lol I got the two mixed up

author: realbigsean
content:
Oh the issue is the same as the one a couple days ago https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/892088344438255616/1154413019170869379

I think LH isn't sending FCU because V3 isn't advertised in `engine_exchangeCapabilities`
